SEARCH
Package game.weapons

Interface Purchasable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Club, GreatKnife, Scimitar, Uchigatana
public interface Purchasable
A Purchasable interface represents a weapon item that a player can buy from the trader. It gives promises to every weapon item that can be purchased from the trader such that their classes implementing this interface should have also implemented these methods listed below. This interface is crucial so that when the player purchases a weapon item from the Trader, then the weapon's purchase price can be accessed, initialize a new PurchaseAction and also get the instance of the weapon item class itself via the implementation of the specific methods. Created by:
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Che'er Min Yi, Chong Ming Sheng, Lam Xin Yuan
